channel.title: Question about mopar and hamachi
channel.description: i wanna get on a server with only me and my friend how we do that? we start hamachi. we make own server, we get in same server then we start mopar, i log on. succesfull. he got error connecting to server :S can someone help??????? we really wanna do this (ow ye we both got megascape) if i start megascape am i supposed to run it? or we both? or only he?
